title: TFR Ep. 601: Morbius, The Bubble, Fresh, What Are The Odds?!?
description:
This week on a special 601st anniversary episode of The First Run, initially things looked pretty bleak for your intrepid hosts. Not only do Matt and Chris discuss the latest Marvel side piece, ‘Morbius’, Chris messed up and watched ‘The Bubble’, forgetting that we all agreed last week to watch ‘Fresh’.  So what did we do? We watched all three. Plus Chris debuts a new feature! So was the week redeemed?  There’s the life-affirming review of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Straight to DVD and Streaming Picks of the Week!  Then Matt and Chris leave the Top 5’s behind, at least for this week, with the return of everyone’s favorite Vegas style segment, ‘What Are The Odds’, featuring Sony, Netflix, and more!  So grab your garlic necklaces, be sure to tenderize your meat, and quarantine yourself with a few pals for this episode of The First Run!

00:00-18:38: Intro/Morbius

18:39-29:47: The Bubble

29:48-38:11: Physical Media Picks

38:12-49:14: Fresh

49:15-1:04:43: What Are The Odds?!?

1:04:44-1:06:31: Wrap Up

 Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook

Not only do Matt and Chris discuss the latest Marvel side piece, ‘Morbius’, Chris messed up and watched ‘The Bubble’, forgetting that we all agreed last week to watch ‘Fresh’.  So what did we do?
